definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: There are unique marine tourism advantages and great potential on Zhoushan Islands.
sentences.chinese: 舟山群岛具有海洋旅游的独特优势和极大潜力。

sentences.english: Donghai bridge situates at the Northeast of Hangzhou bay—the West of Zhoushan islands.
sentences.chinese: 东海大桥位于杭州湾口东北部，舟山群岛西侧。

sentences.english: A numerical study on the floristics of the Zhoushan Archipelago.
sentences.chinese: 舟山群岛植物区系地理的数值研究。

sentences.english: The illegal hunting activity on Zhoushan Islands and near by regions is rampant.
sentences.chinese: 舟山群岛及相邻地区非法狩猎活动很猖獗。

definition: Shengsi Islands, making up Shengsi county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Zhoushan prefecture level city in Zhejiang (consisting solely of islands)/formerly Dinghai 定海
Shengsi county in Zhoushan 舟山[Zhou1 shan1], Zhejiang
Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea
East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
Nan'ao Island in Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2], Guangdong
